title: 谁有1,81的cjb
author: yaya
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yaya 于 2011-9-22 19:20 编辑 

还有，为什么我1.8装mod不管怎么装都是百分之百报错最好还有Modloader

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
[V1.8.1] CJB Mods v4.8.0.zip
(289.33 KB, 下载次数: 139)



2011-9-22 16:19 上传
点击文件名下载附件







How to install:
- INSTALL MODLOADER AND ANY OTHER MOD FIRST, EXCEPT FOR MCPATCHER HD FIX!!!! 
- Place the content of "Put in Minecraft Folder" folder inside ../appdata/roaming/.minecraft/ folder
- Place the content of "Put in 32x32 Texture Pack" inside your 32x32 Texture Pack zip file (only when you have higher resolution texturepacks installed.
- Place the content of "Put in minecraft.jar" folder inside ../appdata/roaming/.minecraft/bin/minecraft.jar
  install qo.class if you want to use X-Ray
  install sz.class if you want to use fly

首先, 版本對不對, 放的位置對不對(該放 .jar 或其他地方), 該裝的有沒有先裝(如ModLoader), 該刪的有沒有刪(META-INF),  該看的有沒有看(安裝說明), 裝多MOD可能會衝突...

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
别告诉我你装了1.7.3
或者没装Modloader
或者连meta都没删
